pages.text: The Eclipse Alloy Paxel represents the pinnacle of tool integration, combining the functionality of a pickaxe, axe, and shovel into a single formidable tool. $(br2)Craft it either by combining an Eclipse Alloy Pickaxe, Axe, and Shovel in a smithing table, or upgrade a $(l:justdirethings:tool_celestigem_paxel)Celestigem Paxel$(/l) using the smithing table. Both methods preserve any installed upgrades.
